title: Mon Post Show (07-18-22)
itunes:title: Mon Post Show (07-18-22)
description:
Bobby starts by sharing a scam text he just got that he almost fell for today. A worker was fired after sharing her salary on TikTok. We dive into why this was a sticky situation and how we are all weird about talking about salaries. A man with a gun fired a shot at a comedy show, a woman gave birth at a 7-11 on 7/11. Bobby got a gift delivered from Jillian Jaqueline during the show. A woman was charged twice at an all-you can eat restaurant. We get an update on Lunchbox’s roof. Eddie thinks that his AirBNB was spying on him during vacation. Raymundo wants us all to vote for him to win a trip to Vegas. Mike reviews the new “Where the Crawdads Sing”.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
